Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/2/1968 to a 4-year deal worth $1,100,000 per year...
Injured on 7/19/1969 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/7/1970 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Released by Cleveland on 5/21/1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Detroit in 1972...
